description.zh: Perplexica 是一个开源的 AI 驱动搜索引擎，旨在深入互联网查找信息，并提供准确且上下文相关的答案。它使用相似性搜索和嵌入等先进机器学习技术优化搜索结果，并通过引用来源确保信息透明。借助 SearxNG 技术，它能够提供最新且保护用户隐私的搜索体验。
description.en: Perplexica is an open-source AI-powered search engine designed to deeply explore the internet and provide accurate, context-aware answers. It leverages advanced machine learning techniques such as similarity search and embeddings to refine results, citing sources for transparency. Powered by SearxNG, it ensures up-to-date and privacy-preserving search experiences.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 开源且注重隐私的搜索引擎
- 结合 AI 与网页搜索实现更深入的理解
- 通过集成 SearxNG 确保信息的时效性
- 支持本地和云端 LLM，部署灵活

## 功能列表:

- 支持本地大语言模型（如 Llama3、Mixtral）通过 Ollama
- 两种主要搜索模式：协作模式（开发中）与普通模式
- 多种聚焦模式：通用、写作助手、学术、YouTube、Wolfram Alpha、Reddit
- 基于 SearxNG 的实时信息检索
- 提供 API 接口，便于集成至其他应用
- 支持浏览器快捷搜索入口
- 提供一键部署选项
- 支持图像和视频搜索
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source and privacy-focused search engine
- Combines AI and web search for deeper understanding
- Ensures up-to-date information via SearxNG integration
- Supports local and hosted LLMs for flexible deployment

## Features:

- Local LLM support (e.g., Llama3, Mixtral) via Ollama
- Two main search modes: Copilot Mode (in development) and Normal Mode
- Multiple Focus Modes: All, Writing Assistant, Academic, YouTube, Wolfram Alpha, Reddit
- Real-time, current information retrieval using SearxNG
- API integration for embedding search capabilities into other applications
- Browser integration for quick access as a search engine
- One-click deployment options available
- Supports image and video search
